useCase.name: Manage Weekly Meal Plan
useCase.description: Allow the user to create and manage their weekly meal plan

preconditions.precondition: User is logged in and has navigated to the meal planning section

mainSequence.step: Brenna initializes the week by setting it to today
Brenna filters recipes by certain criteria
Brenna adds a recipe to the weekly plan
Brenna selects a relevant ingredient to add to the plan
Brenna views the grocery list for the plan
